column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ At 12:00 pm on May 28
column5: a Korean national named LEE TAE SEON
column7: was admitted to the immigration office of Phnom Penh Police Office located at 13
column10: Phnom Penh.------ He asked police to help him as he is without a passport
column12: no real place of residence and wants to go home to Korea.------Then the investigating officer found that he came to Cambodia on 12.04.2015 at Phnom Penh International Airport.------He was sent to the Department of Immigration to carry out procedures.
